name: Clause → NISM Exam Mapping Dataset Based on: SEBI's Dec 2025 Circular Relaxation on geo tagging requirement in India for NRIs while undertaking re-KYC
description: Structured dataset representing clause-to-exam mappings from the GurukulOnRoad decoding of SEBI’s circular on relaxation of geo-tagging requirements for NRIs during re-KYC.

isPartOf.name: RegDEEP™ - Regulatory Decoding & Explanation for Exam Purpose™
SEBI AIF: AI-only LVF NISM XIX Exam & Industry Note FREE PDF Micro Summary
isPartOf.description: FREE PDF: RegDEEP™ Quick Exam Revision & Industry Note - SEBI Circular (Dec 10, 2025): Relaxation on Geo-tagging for NRIs during Re-KYC. A Compact 2-in-1 RegDEEP guide Exam decoding + Industry actions for the latest SEBI update. Designed for NISM aspirants, MF distributors, RIAs, brokers, banks, fintechs, and all intermediaries using KYC/Re-KYC. Section 1: NISM Exam Aspirants- Snapshot summary, Exam essentials & high-yield points, Remember this distinctions, Likely MCQ triggers, and Clause → NISM Series mapping. Section 2: Industry Note All Intermediaries: Snapshot & operational meaning, Immediate action items, Implementation mapping table, Tech-Product checklist, Compliance notes, and Escalation matrix guidance.

isPartOf.headline: SEBI's Dec 2025 CIrcular Eases On NRI Re-KYC Geo-Tag Explained: NISM Exam & Industry Notes  -  RegDEEP™ Decoding | FAQs | Glossary | FREE PDF Micro Summary
isPartOf.name: Modalities for migration to AI only schemes and relaxations to Large Value Funds for Accredited Investors under SEBI Alternative Investment Funds Regulations, 2012
isPartOf.description: An exam-focused and industry-oriented analysis of SEBI's Dec 10, 2025 circular easing geo-tagging requirements for NRIs during re-KYC; includes clause breakdown, NISM exam relevance, operational notes and sample MCQs.

usageInfo: This structured data entry represents an educational summary and regulatory decoding under RegDEEP. It is not an official SEBI circular. Refer to the regulator’s website for authoritative information.

hasPart.name: ClauseExamMapping JSON Schema
hasPart.text: {"$schema":"https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema","title":"ClauseExamMapping","description":"Dataset schema for mapping regulatory clauses to their plain meaning, NISM exam relevance, and exam focus based on the table from the GurukulOnRoad circular page.","type":"object","properties":{"clause_exam_mapping":{"type":"array","description":"List of clause-to-exam relevance mappings","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","description":"Unique row identifier"},"clause":{"type":"string","description":"Regulatory clause name or section"},"plain_meaning":{"type":"string","description":"Simplified meaning of the clause"},"nism_exams":{"type":"string","description":"List of relevant NISM modules"},"exam_focus":{"type":"string","description":"Expected exam question pattern or focus"}},"required":["id","clause","plain_meaning","nism_exams","exam_focus"]}}},"required":["clause_exam_mapping"],"examples":[{"clause_exam_mapping":[{"id":1,"clause":"Industry feedback","plain_meaning":"Reason for change","nism_exams":"All NISM modules with KYC","exam_focus":"Context questions: why change, stakeholder inputs"},{"id":2,"clause":"Relaxation for NRIs (re-KYC)","plain_meaning":"NRIs can do re-KYC from abroad","nism_exams":"V-A & V-B (Unit 9.10.3), X-A, X-B, VIII, VI","exam_focus":"Direct MCQ: Is physical presence required? (No)"},{"id":3,"clause":"Para 51 - GPS must match PoA country","plain_meaning":"GPS must match country in PoA","nism_exams":"V-A, V-B, VI, X-A/X-B","exam_focus":"Scenario: GPS/PoA mismatch → action required"},{"id":4,"clause":"Anti-spoofing / liveness / timestamps","plain_meaning":"Security checks stay","nism_exams":"VII (SORM), V-A, X-A/X-B","exam_focus":"Questions on KYC app features & fraud controls"},{"id":5,"clause":"Legal authority (Sec 11(1))","plain_meaning":"SEBI’s power to issue circulars","nism_exams":"All NISM exams","exam_focus":"Regulatory source questions"}]}]}
